title: Temo - Emotion-Based Drone Interaction
description: An innovative project integrating facial emotion recognition with a DJI Tello drone. Temo interprets human facial expressions to control drone behavior, creating an interactive and responsive aerial experience. Using the ROS2 Tello wrapper developed by the SNT-ARG Team from the University of Luxembourg.

title: Temo - Tello Mixed Reality Handcontrol
description: This innovative project integrates facial emotion recognition with a DJI Tello drone to create an interactive and responsive aerial experience. TEMO interprets human facial expressions to control drone behavior, enabling dynamic human-drone interaction. It is built upon the ROS2 Tello wrapper developed by the SNT-ARG Team at the University of Luxembourg. The current second iteration of TEMO expands the system significantly by introducing several new modules and control methods: full control using a PS4 controller, full control via smartphone IMU sensors, full control using an ESP32 paired with an MPU9250 sensor, and an immersive target shooter game from the drone's perspective, where users interact with ArUco markers as targets. These new features aim to push the boundaries of intuitive drone interaction, making TEMO more versatile and engaging than ever before.

title: RPI2-FreeRTOS-CAN-BUS
description: This project extends FreeRTOS for the Raspberry Pi 2, enabling CAN BUS communication capabilities. It features SPI drivers, MCP2515 controller support, and integrates TACLEBENCH for embedded systems benchmarking. The implementation facilitates real-time task management and inter-device communication in embedded applications.

title: Alma Da Beira Alta - Website
description: Website for the Alma Da Beira Alta cultural association in Luxembourg. Includes a public homepage, events with registration, gallery, about page, and a secure admin panel to manage events, gallery, members, and finances. Multi-language support (EN/FR/PT/DE) and fully responsive.

title: Imposter Hunt
description: Imposter Hunt is a fast-paced pass-and-play social deduction game where players try to identify the Imposter on a single shared device. Players receive a secret word except the Imposter, who must blend in and guess the word after surviving the voting rounds. The project features an AI-backed generation API that lets users create custom word lists from their own input (for example, 'Clash Royale cards' or any custom theme). Generated lists are saved locally and can be used as the secret-word pool for games.

title: ROS Monitor
description: ROS Monitor is a mobile application designed to interface with ROS (Robot Operating System) environments. It provides real-time monitoring and control of ROS topics, services, and parameters through an intuitive mobile interface. The app leverages React Native and Expo for cross-platform compatibility, allowing users to connect to ROS bridges and visualize data streams on their smartphones or tablets. Ideal for robotics developers and enthusiasts, ROS Monitor enhances the ability to manage and debug ROS-based systems remotely.

title: LetzGrade Mobile App
description: LetzGrade is a mobile application designed to simplify academic grading and feedback for students in the Luxembourgish high school system. The app offers an intuitive interface for managing grades and automatically calculates averages. Built with cross-platform technologies, LetzGrade helps students stay organized and makes grade tracking easier, even for the most chaotic learners.

title: LetzGrade Web
description: LetzGrade Web is a landing page designed to present and promote the LetzGrade Mobile App. It provides an overview of the app's features, technology stack, and benefits for students and educators. The site serves as an entry point for users to learn more about LetzGrade and access download links for Android and iOS.
